results.title: Metformin ameliorates trophoblastic immunometabolic disorders via attenuating TLR4/NF-kappaB signaling through ATXN7L3-mediated histone H2B monoubiquitination.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Trophoblastic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014328 @@@trophoblastic immunometabolic disorders@@@ via attenuating @GENE_TLR4 @GENE_7099 @@@TLR4@@@/@GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-kappaB@@@ signaling through @GENE_ATXN7L3 @GENE_56970 @@@ATXN7L3@@@-mediated histone H2B monoubiquitination.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Yu Z, Zhao Y, Zou L, Deng B, Liu X. Metformin ameliorates trophoblastic immunometabolic disorders via attenuating TLR4/NF-kappaB signaling through ATXN7L3-mediated histone H2B monoubiquitination. Placenta. 2025 Mar 31;165():50-61. PMID: 40209519

results.title: [Metformin ameliorates PM2.5-induced functional impairment of placental trophoblasts by inhibiting ferroptosis].
results.journal: Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: PM2.5 exposure during pregnancy causes adverse pregnancy outcomes and ferroptosis and functional impairment of placental trophoblasts in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can effectively alleviate PM2.5-induced @<m>DISEASE_Trophoblastic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014328 @@@trophoblast impairment@@@.

citations.NLM: Li S, Yu S, Mu Y, Wang K, Liu Y, Zhang M. [Metformin ameliorates PM2.5-induced functional impairment of placental trophoblasts by inhibiting ferroptosis]. Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao. 2024 Mar 20;44(3):437-446. PMID: 38597434
